entry.title: robins appear when loved ones are near
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,599Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 136

Summary: "Where is Superman?" Dick asks with a small frown. "What do you mean?" "Aren't you dating him?" Dick tilts his head with genuine curiosity. "He should be here taking care of you. I thought Superman helped people, especially his boyfriend." "What-- we-- we're not..." Bruce starts to stammer, not sure how to even answer this. "Are you and Superman in a fight?" Dick presses, eyes big, voice dropping into a hushed whisper, "Because when me and my best friend at school fight we say mean things, and then we say we're sorry."   (Or, Battinson trying to be a good parent to Dick while fighting against his feelings for Clark Kent. Dick's there to save the day.)

entry.title: i'll dance with you ('til the cows come home)
entry.summary:
Author: April_Blooms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 511Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Superbat Week Day 4 Prompts: Quality Time in the Cave/ Visiting the farm/ Odd tokens of Affection “Bruce, why do you have a cow in the cave?” “Damien saved her.” Bruce says. It's been a long week. “Everything will be sourced. Bedding, food, milking tools.” Clark gives him a look. “She’s a beef cow and she doesn’t have a calf. There’s nothing to milk.” Bruce looks down at his keyboard. “You know nothing about cow care, do you?” Clark says. “I can research.” Bruce says weakly. “You do that.” Clark says. “I’m taking the cow.” oOo Bat-Cow is rehomed at the Kent farm. Damien visits constantly to see her. Bruce does too. To see the cow, of course. What else?

entry.title: My Boyfriend, His Best Friend, and Me (Send Help)
entry.summary:
Author: MochiLoverYummy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 938Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Jenny thought the most awkward thing that could happen after a night of wild sex with Bruce Wayne was Alfred knocking on the bedroom door. She was wrong. Very, very wrong. Because Superman crash-lands into bed like a sad golden retriever fresh from a fight with Lois, and suddenly Jenny finds herself living in a Grey’s Anatomy episode. Between Bruce’s casual stoicism, Clark’s emotional spiral, and Lois on speed-dial, Jenny realizes one terrible truth: she’s the Derek Shepherd in the Batman-Superman best-friend marriage. And there’s no surgical residency program for that.
